item.title: About
item.description: Adylan Roaffa Loves to eat and play games (Souls-like is my favorite). Currently working as a Software Engineer in Singapore. Self-proclaimed stoic. Working on my range. Currently reading Economics in One Lesson

item.title: Yet Another Blog
item.description: Just like every other developers in the planet, we tend to create a brand new blog every single year. I try to keep it simple though this time. The goal of this blog is not to promote myself as someone that can build a website, but to learn how to write properly. I do not want it to be a “goal” like a year ago when I tried to create “30 Days of Writing” challenge and failed miserably in the middle of the challenge.
